Mode 3: 'Brightening' (green light at 520nm): helps alleviate pigmentation. Mode 4: 'Post Procedure' (near infrared light at 830nm with red light (630nm) and blue light (415nm)): accelerates healing and inhibits scarring Mode 5: 'Calming' (blue light (415nm) and green light (520nm): calms the skin and targets inflammation Mode 6: 'Anti-Ageing Express' (red light at 630nm): an intensified youth-boosting treatment (recommended treatment time is 10 minutes). *Please refer to the included operating manual for more information on how to use this product.

Start from the upper inner edge where your nose hits your brow (there is a pressure point that is more sensitive than the rest of the area, this drains the sinuses when stimulated!) and move outwards, roll around the top and under the eye towards the tear duct, rocking it gently as you go. Then place the roller vertically into the inner corner of the eye, using gentle rocking motion. Press lightly to encourage lymph drainage in the eye zone, ease blocked sinuses and reduce puffiness.

This innovative fragrance replicates the molecular compounds produced by trees (read: phytoncides) that are credited for the positive health benefits associated with forest bathing, namely the balancing of stress levels and boosting the parasympathetic (rest) nervous system. As for the scent itself, expect a woody and smoky profile of vetiver, cedarwood, benzoin and pine, punctuated with clean resin and tart citrus notes. In research conducted by The Nue Co., 96% of participants felt less stressed within 30 minutes of using Forest Lungs and 91% felt their anxiety levels were reduced after using it for thirty days.
how_to_use: WHEN: Daily, or as required. HOW: Spray onto wrists and neck. Inhale for eight, hold for four, exhale for eight DOSE: 2+ sprays For full-body stress support, try pairing with MOOD.

name: Slip Silk Pillowcase - Queen (Various Colours) Slip Silk Pillowcase - Queen (Various Colours)
description: We spend a third of our lives in bed. By the time we’re 60, most of us will have slept for an average of 20 years. Given how well-acquainted this makes us with our pillows, it’s worth investing in the best pillowcase possible. Cotton cases can draw moisture from the face, hair and scalp, whereas Slips Silk Pillowcases are made from 100% pure mulberry silk, which is a breathable, natural temperature regulator. Gentle on skin and hair, this clever material helps to age-defy while reducing sleep-induced facial creases and stopping strands from being twisted and damaged throughout the night. Tested by an independent third-party lab, Slip's Pure Silk Pillowcases were shown to absorb significantly less face cream than the average cotton pillowcase, all while creating 43% less friction too! This means less inflammatory stress on your skin, and less stress on your hair in fact, if you’ve splurged on a fancy blow dry, this will ensure that it stays intact, saving you from waking up with a bedhead. Specially commissioned, the silk used is made to exacting standards developed and refined over ten years to achieve the ultimate combination of shine, thickness, softness and durability. In a spectrum of sublime shades from plum to rose gold via silver, ‘Blush’, ‘Ultra Violet’, 'Black', ‘Wildflower’ and ‘Peony’ or traditional white, there's a queen-sized (20" x 30") silk treat to suit every bedroom aesthetic.
how_to_use: Use up to 8 hours daily for maximum results.
ingredient: Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fiber mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme, with invisible zipper.

name: HUM Nutrition Air Patrol HUM Nutrition Air Patrol
description: Living in the city? Trust Air Patrol to increase your resistance to harmful effects of the everyday onslaught. With esterified vitamin C (a renowned antioxidant) alongside citrus bioflavonoids, these capsules behave like a filter - supporting your body's innate and adaptive immune responses, while helping to neutralise damaging radicals (perfect for shielding your skin from aggressors). Delivering maximum potency while being easy on the stomach, each once-a-day capsule protects your skin, lungs and defence mechanisms to ward against seasonal sniffles, airborne bugs and the insidious toll of pollution. The addition of calcium then works to safeguard your bones and support their strength, density and ability to withstand the demands of our hectic regimes.

Contains NO: yeast, wheat, milk, egg, soy, gluten, fish, crustacean shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, added sugar, starch, artificial colours, flavours or preservatives.

name: Baûbo Q Balm Anal Care 15ml Baûbo Q Balm Anal Care 15ml
description: No ifs, ands or butts (sorry...), the world of wellness has long neglected anal care. Here to rectify the matter, Baûbo’s Q Balm is the first 100% natural & 100% organic anal care product for everyone: after sex, constipation, after spicy food, during pregnancy, prostate massage, post-partum relief... 100% natural and organic, this buttery balm is formulated with skin-friendly coconut, ricin, shea butter, beeswax, carnauba wax, calendula and hamamelis to help soothe, soften, calm, heal and nourish the delicate skin of the anus. name: OSKIA Bedtime Beauty Boost (50ml) OSKIA Bedtime Beauty Boost (50ml)
description: A luxurious night cream, Oskia’s Bedtime Beauty Boost nourishes and regenerates skin as you slumber. Light in texture but rich in essential cell nutrients - including MSM Regen-Complex, milk peptides, vitamins A, B3 and E, Swiss apple stem cells, hyaluronic acid, phytosterols and omegas 3, 6 and 9 - this non-greasy formula sinks in quickly (no more ruined pillowcases) where is sets straight to work, assisting skin’s natural processes of repair and renewal. Beauty sleep is not just the stuff of fairy tale – while you rest, you secrete hormones that encourage cell turnover and help fortify skin’s proteins (building blocks like collagen and elastin); Bedtime Beauty Boost literally ‘boosts’ the effects of these hormones, so you wake to a radiant, velvety soft complexion.
how_to_use: Gently massage onto cleansed face, neck and décolletage before bed.

Natural Ingredients, Store In A Cool, Dry Place.

name: Dr. Nigma Talib. ND Beauty In A Bottle Dr. Nigma Talib. ND Beauty In A Bottle
description: Bursting with 20 powerful ingredients, Beauty In A Bottle will nourish your insides to help boost your outsides — working to improve the health of your skin, hair and nails. A unique ‘Beauty Blend’ cocktails together ingredients like bamboo stem extract with grape skin extract to rebuild the likes of collagen and keratin — which are essential ‘building blocks’ for strong skin and hair — while vitamins A, C and E too contribute to collagen formation. These supplements also call on D biotin — a potent dose of biotin that helps you to convert nutrients into energy, which plays an important role in the prevention of scaly skin, sparse hair and brittle nails. Iodine is an essential mineral that encourages your thyroid gland to work optimally for a healthy metabolism, and vitamin B joins selenium and copper in repairing skin’s elasticity. Free from sugar, gluten, dairy, artificial colours and artificial flavourings, Beauty In A Bottle is also suitable for vegetarians.

name: Smile Makers The Poet - Powerful Suction Vibrator Smile Makers The Poet - Powerful Suction Vibrator
description: Get more from your personal play, with the Smile Makers The Poet Air Pulse Clitoral Massager. The Poet is inspired by a kiss from nature, designed to recreate the feel of oral sex. Crafted from smooth, waterproof silicone, the vibrator is a true champion of female pleasure. It arrives with 3 mouths in different sizes and 5 pulsation modes, while squeeze sensors allow you to adjust the toy’s intensity to suit your needs. Advanced technology is said to pulsate more air than leading products in its category. Explore targeted, unparalleled pleasure that takes you to dizzying new heights, thanks to the Smile Makers clitoral stimulator.

It can make the experience even more realistic and heighten sensations. Tip #4: Explore pulsation modes.

name: Vida Glow Radiance - 30 Capsules Vida Glow Radiance - 30 Capsules
description: Got your glow-boosting skin care routine down, but still feeling a little lacklustre? Meet Vida Glow Radiance Capsules; clinically proven to amp up luminosity, brighten dark circles and fade discoloration — all in one capsule a day. The megawatt results come courtesy of Skinax2, a powerful proprietary blend of antioxidants, vitamin C and zinc to promote repair, boost radiance by a dramatic 26% and reduce dark spots for a more even skin tone. Added carotenoids improve overall tone and firmness for a truly fresh-faced finish. Glow get it!

name: ilapothecary Magnesium and Amethyst Deep Relax Bath Soak 400ml ilapothecary Magnesium and Amethyst Deep Relax Bath Soak 400ml
description: Elevating your soak to a level of sanctity, ilāpothecary's Magnesium and Amethyst Deep Relax Bath Soak is laced with powerfully reparative and relaxing oils and gems that merge beautifully with warm water to instate a sense of supreme peacefulness. Now in a 100% recyclable, unique and high-end black miron glass jar, the luxe packaging has even been upgraded with a screw-on lid to enhance ease of use. A godsend after a long, stressful day, the magnesium and mineral-rich salts work to relax muscles, ease nervous tension and promote deeper sleep. As for spirit-lifting ingredients, amber is believed to absorb pain and negative energy as it alleviates stress and encourages self-confidence; amethyst helps soothe inflamed skin and is believed to relax the nerves and help heal the aura, allowing it to restore and rebalance; benzoin oil is a wonderfully reassuring oil that helps to calm stressed, burnt-out minds; last but not least, purifying cedarwood (sometimes known as the 'sleepy' oil) helps to stimulate the release of melatonin and deeply relax the body. Your duvet will be calling you as soon as you step out of the tub...

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Growth Cycle Hair Supplement 60 capsules Dr. Barbara Sturm Growth Cycle Hair Supplement 60 capsules
description: After a painstaking six years of research and clinical testing, Dr. Barbara Sturm's ‘DBS Hair System™' has arrived, ready to help you prevent premature hair shedding and support your strands from the inside, out. Introducing the Growth Cycle Hair Supplement from Dr. Barbara Sturm... containing a powerful nutrient complex - known as the ‘DBS Hair System™' - which takes a molecular science approach to keep your tresses healthy and full. Premature hair fall can occur due to hormonal imbalances, fluctuating oestrogen levels during menopause, inflammation or aggressive styling, thereby shortening the growth phase. Help is at hand though, as these carefully crafted supplements have been designed to support growth signals from within. The plant-based, patented complex works to penetrate the follicles where the key ingredient - miliacin - stimulates your strands right at the root to improve hair retention and reduce shedding. Combined with amino acids, pine bark extract and biotin these hair-loving supplements will soon reveal stronger, glossier and fuller-looking hair.
how_to_use: Take two capsules a day with a glass of water at meal time, preferably in the morning or during the day. For best results, combine with Dr. Sturm's MOLECULAR HAIR & SCALP ANTI-HAIR FALL COLLECTION.
ingredient: DBS Hair SystemTM, Vitamin C containing Acerola Cherry Powder, L-Cysteine, L-Lysine, Silicium containing Bamboo Stem Extract, Proanthocyanidins containing Pine Bark Extract, L-Methionine, L-Glycine, Zinc, Iron, Pantothenic Acid, Vitamin D, Biotin.

name: Dr. Barbara Sturm Skin Anti-Pigmentation 60 capsules Dr. Barbara Sturm Skin Anti-Pigmentation 60 capsules
description: Brimming with a brightening nutrient complex, Dr. Barbara Sturm’s Skin Anti-Pigmentation helps to promote an even tone and lighten the look of dark spots, resulting in a more radiant complexion. A source of hydroxytyrosol (read: a strong antioxidant), olive leaf extract provides a brightening effect, diminishing uneven pigmentation; vitamin C and vitamin E then unleash their antioxidant benefits and support the skin’s natural barrier function, providing vital protection against free radicals. Centella asiatica, a soothing and hydrating ingredient, lends the supplement its rich source of amino acids and prolongs the effects of hyaluronic acid within your skin. Biotin moisturises and rejuvenates while purslane reduces the visible signs of irritation and copper supports normal skin pigmentation. Take this supplement while using the 'Brightening Line' for a heightened boost to significantly reduce signs of hyper-pigmentation and promote a radiant complexion.
how_to_use: Take two capsules a day with a glass of water at meal-time, preferably in the morning or during the day. The DR. BARBARA STURM INSIDE supplements can be taken all together or individually. If you are pregnant, planning to conceive, breastfeeding or taking any other medication, please consult with your doctor beforehand.
ingredient: Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract (Tigergrass), Hydroxypropylmethylcellulose (Capsule Shell), Olive Leaf Extract containing Hydroxytyrosol, Purslane Herb Extract, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E (D-alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate), Rice Extract, Copper Citrate, Biotin.

name: The Nue Co. Iron Capsules - 30 Capsules The Nue Co. Iron Capsules - 30 Capsules
description: It’s thought that a third of the world is deficient in iron: an important blood-boosting mineral that contributes to the formation of red blood cells and how energised we feel. The Nue Co.’s bioavailable Iron supplement features 14mg of elemental iron, sourced from beetroot, to quickly boost reserves and flagging energy levels. Formulated with vitamin C and citrus bioflavonoids — to help the body quickly and easily absorb iron — these easy-to-take capsules help to reduce tiredness, while supporting oxygen transportation, immune function and cognitive function (see ya, brain fog!). Using only ethically and sustainably sourced ingredients, The Nue Co.’s supplements come with a clean, potent and proven promise — so you can be sure this is a truly feel-good formula.
how_to_use: Take one capsule per day.
ingredient: Beetroot Extract, Brown Rice Flour, Capsule Shell (Hydroxypropyl Methyl Cellulose), Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Citrus Bioflavonoids Extract, Iron (Ferrous Fumarate), Riboflavin (Riboflavin-5 Phosphate Sodium), Molybdenum (Sodium Molybdate).

name: Moon Juice Collagen Protect Supplements 127.6g Moon Juice Collagen Protect Supplements 127.6g
description: A collagen supplement for the vegan beauty connoisseurs amongst us — Moon Juice’s Collagen Protect protects and preserves your natural collagen for a more youthful complexion. Did you know your collagen naturally breaks down with stress and time? So while your own collagen might be best, it does need a little helping hand as we age to stay in good supply. The Collagen Protect supplement feeds your skin and protects your innate collagen supply with 3 vegan ingredients. Pure and fermented hyaluronic acid increases your skins moisture levels and reduces the intensity of fine lines at the surface. Tocos — sourced from organic Thai jasmine rice and grown by a farm collective in Thailand — works hard to protect your natural collagen and prevent early signs of visible ageing. Grown organically in China, silver ear mushroom is abundant in antioxidants and one of the only vegan sources of vitamin D (we learn something new every day) — at a dose of 2.45g this supports a healthy skin barrier. What’s even better? It tastes good too! So top up your daily caffeine boost or morning smoothie and care for your collagen with this ‘magical’ collagen supplement.
how_to_use: Collagen Protect® is a vegan collagen supplement. Add 1 rounded tbsp of this skin-protecting creamer to coffee or smoothies to promote healthy skin and hair. No additives, so may clump. Blend for maximum yum.
ingredient: Rice Bran Solubles (Tocotrienols), Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp (Silver Ear Mushroom), Sodium Hyaluronate - Salt of Hyaluronic Acid. 100% NATURALLY-DERIVED INGREDIENTS.

name: Susanne Kaufmann Bath for The Senses Oil 100ml Susanne Kaufmann Bath for The Senses Oil 100ml
description: Delectably scented, Susanne Kaufmann’s Oil Bath for the Senses is the ultimate way to unwind at the end of a long, stressful day. A potent, skin-strengthening and soul-soothing blend of oils, this exquisite soak helps to alleviate tension and replenish precious moisture, so that skin is left feeling velvety-textured and your mind is left feeling at ease. Antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and aromatherapeutic, this stunning blend of ylang ylang, patchouli and lavender is compatible with all skin types – just add 30ml to a tub of steaming water, sink in and relax as all your worries wash away.

name: Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Soy Wax Candle - Shinrin-Yoku 170ml Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Soy Wax Candle - Shinrin-Yoku 170ml
description: With candles at the core of the brand since their beginnings as a weekly pop-up stall at Netil Market, it's safe to say that Earl of East's Japanese Bathing Ritual Soy Wax Candle is the ultimate introduction to the range (and a delight for anyone with a bougie obsession). Beyond their effortlessly chic vessels and refined typography, the candles are made from an eco-soy blend of high-quality, raw materials from ethical suppliers; co-founder Niko Dafkos assures that their work does not contribute to deforestation and respects the rights of workers and indigenous people. Available in two heavenly scents, the only hard part is picking your favourite; taking its name from the Japanese word for hot spring, the Onsen scent profile has an uplifting medley of peppermint, eucalyptus and neroli that emulates the very same sense of serenity that makes the onsen a cultural tradition. The Shinrin Yoku literally forest bath in Japanese scent is an ode to the practice of disconnecting from our fast-paced world, being in nature and absorbing the peaceful atmosphere of the woods. It has an earthy profile of cedarwood, black pepper and oakmoss that conjures the image of a forest floor after the early morning rain abates.
how_to_use: Place in the central part of the room for optimum fragrance distribution.
ingredient: These candles are made out of 100% eco-soy [non-GMO] wax & essential oils. All materials used are vegan, non-GMO, paraben-free, phthalate free & cruelty free. Glue used is solvent free & vegan.

name: de Mamiel Soothe de Mamiel Soothe
description: The product of extensive research into why we don’t sleep and what keeps us awake, de Mamiel’s ingenious Sleep Series is a sublime remedy for the over-tired among us. Soothe unburdens the mind of anxious, stressed feelings, allowing you to let go of governing thought and quelling any inner turmoil you’re experiencing. The clever blend works beyond mere sedation, providing a welcome balance and stopping the uncomfortable churning feeling we often hold in our centre. The base oil combines a bespoke blend of herbs, watermelon seed oil and passionflower oil to maximise the absorption of minerals such as magnesium and zinc and B vitamins that are essential for quality sleep. Together with luscious essential oils (including sandalwood, ginger root and mandarin peel) these ingredients will settle both senses and body to lull you into a deep, comfortable slumber. Working in harmony with de Mamiel’s Anchor and Settle blends, this forms part of the ‘Sleep’ phase of the brand’s Sleep Series, while Rise and Shine form the ‘Awake’ element.
how_to_use: Apply Soothe to your palms and gently warm in your hands. Place over your nose and breathe deeply for a minimum of 3 breaths. Anoint the inside of your wrists and rub into your stomach and centre line. Use at bedtime and as often as you need throughout the day.

description: Created to help women during the pre and postnatal period, the Womb Service supplement combo delivers clean, daily nutrients for mother and baby. Available in two heavenly scents, the only hard part is picking your favourite; taking its name from the Japanese word for hot spring, the Onsen scent profile has an uplifting medley of peppermint, eucalyptus and neroli that emulates the very same sense of serenity that makes the onsen a cultural tradition. The Shinrin Yoku literally forest bath in Japanese scent is an ode to the practice of disconnecting from our fast-paced world, being in nature and absorbing the peaceful atmosphere of the woods. It has an earthy profile of cedarwood, black pepper and oakmoss that conjures the image of a forest floor after the early morning rain abates.
how_to_use: Place in the central part of the room for optimum fragrance distribution.
ingredient: These candles are made out of 100% eco-soy [non-GMO] wax & essential oils. All materials used are vegan, non-GMO, paraben-free, phthalate free & cruelty free. Glue used is solvent free & vegan.

Don't be alarmed if your skin feels warm and tingly, and it's perfectly safe to fall asleep for a while. If you are uncertain, always consult your doctor. Keep away from children 5 years of age and younger Leaning against it (rather than laying on top of the mat and pillow) is a lighter way to use Bed of Nails while you acclimatise (you put less weight on the spikes when you do). Place the mat/pillow at the back of your sofa, bed or armchair to experience the benefits while building up your tolerance.
ingredient: The nails are made of 100% recycled non-toxic ABS plastic, the textile is cotton. The Bed of Nails should not be used in case of skin disease, haemophilia or the intake of anticoagulants.

name: Slip Pure Silk Queen Pillowcase - Pistachio Slip Pure Silk Queen Pillowcase - Pistachio
description: We spend a third of our lives in bed. By the time we’re 60, most of us will have slept for an average of 20 years. Given how well-acquainted this makes us with our pillows, it’s worth investing in the best pillowcase possible. Cotton cases can draw moisture from the face, hair and scalp, whereas Slip’s Silk Pillowcases are made from 100% pure mulberry silk, which is a breathable, natural temperature regulator. Gentle on skin and hair, this clever material helps to age-defy while reducing sleep-induced facial creases and stopping strands from being twisted and damaged throughout the night. Tested by an independent third-party lab, these zippered pillowcases were shown to absorb significantly less face cream than the average cotton pillowcase, all while creating 43% less friction too! This means less inflammatory stress on your skin, and less stress on your hair. If you’ve splurged on a fancy blow dry, this will ensure that it stays intact and save you from waking up with a bedhead. Adding a touch of Italian luxury to your night-time rituals are a limited-edition collection of sublime shades from ‘Portofino’ to ‘Limoncello’ and ‘Pistachio’... there's a queen-sized (20" x 30") silk treat to suit every bedroom aesthetic.

ingredient: Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme, with invisible zipper.

description: A do-it-all food supplement that supports the gut microbiome, oral health, skin health, iron regulation and your immune system, Lactoferrin + combines lactoferrin and L-glutamine in 100% natural, vegetarian and gluten-free capsules. Made from fresh cow’s milk and farmed in France, lactoferrin is a natural, biologically active, iron-binding glycoprotein made up of a whopping 691 amino acids. A key protein found within your body, it’s already in your saliva, tears, white blood cells and sweat, and boasts antifungal, antiviral, antiparasitic, anti-inflammatory and skin-healing benefits. L-glutamine on the other hand, is the most commonly-found amino acid in your body – it’s needed for immune support and the production of glycogen and muscle tissue. It even fuels your intestinal cells, which makes it a key support for the digestive system. Together, these two ingredients work to regulate and reduce inflammation while encouraging cell regeneration, which helps to calm blemish-prone complexions and support skin repair – working to smooth the look of post-blemish scarring. They also support the gut microbiome – encouraging healthy gut flora to improve gut conditions, your skin health and your immune system. If we had the power to present these hardworking capsules with a Nobel Prize, we would.
how_to_use: For skin, oral & gut health: Adults – 1 capsule a day. For oral health, open capsule, mix with water and gargle before swallowing. For immunity support: Preventative dose – 1 capsule, once a day, ideally during the winter months. Loading Dose (from the first inkling you’re feeling run down) – 1 capsule, 3 times a day, until feeling yourself. Suitable for children – Recommended dose 1 capsule opened and sprinkled onto food. CAUTIONS: Food supplements should not be used to substitute a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Lactoferrin is not intended to diagnose, treat or cure but designed only to support the natural immune system, gut and skin health. For all medical conditions, consult a healthcare practitioner prior to use and/or if you are allergic to dairy.
ingredient: 1 capsule contains: L-Glutamine (300mg), Bovine Lactoferrin (200mg), Magnesium Stearate (flow agent), Vegetarian Capsule (HPMC) Proferrin is a pure, native Lactoferrin, from fresh cow milk farmed in France.

name: LARQ Bottle 500ml LARQ Bottle 500ml
description: Say goodbye to mouldy water bottles - the LARQ Bottle features UV-C LED lights, making it the world's first self-cleaning and purifying water bottle that kills 99.9% of bio-contaminants at the touch of a button. The revolutionary design is built around LARQ's proprietary PureVis„ technology that harnesses UV-C light to eradicate germs by triggering a photochemical reaction that destroys their DNA it's a common sterilising in hospitals today! Another world-first, this technology makes the bottle the only mercury-free portable water sanitization system - we're always a fan of brands that forgo toxic chemicals (obviously!). As well as purifying water in 60 seconds when you press the button, it also activates on its own every two hours to keep your water and bottle clean. It's double-wall insulated - it keeps water cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 - and powered by a rechargeable lithium-polymer battery that lasts up to 1 month off of one charge, based on estimated usage of 3-4 cycles a day. We know what you're thinking, just how many filters am I going to have to fork out for? The answer is none! This bottle is filter-free so you won't need to worry about buying replacements. Instead, you can be happy in the knowledge that you invested in a sustainable, self-cleaning bottle.
how_to_use: Press the LARQ Bottle cap once to activate it and in 60 seconds you'll have pure water to drink. Travel Mode deactivates Self-Cleaning Mode and is recommended if you are storing your LARQ Bottle for an extended period of time or to conserve battery life. Normal Mode is a 1-minute cleaning cycle and delivers 12 mJ/cm^2 of UVC to the water and the inner surface of the bottle. Tap the button on the cap once to activate the cycle. Its the right choice for daily use if your water is from a trustworthy source. In Adventure Mode, the LARQ Bottle delivers a higher dose of UVC: >30 mJ/cm^2. Activate this 3-minute cycle by double-tapping the button on the cap. Its a good choice if youre not sure about the quality of your water or you just want extra peace of mind. Charging: The LARQ Bottle can be recharged via Micro-USB. It is located on the side of the cap. A charging cable is included with your LARQ Bottle.

name: Zitsticka Blur Potion Discoloration Brightening Supplement 112.34g Zitsticka Blur Potion Discoloration Brightening Supplement 112.34g
